title: [Basalt Flats, Volcanic Rock]
description: The terrain transforms into craggy volcanic rock spotted with lichens.  Trickling through a recessed bed, a small stream makes its way south.  Moonlight glints faintly here and there on the water's surface, deflected in most places by the dark, pocked rock.

The terrain transforms into craggy volcanic rock spotted with lichens.  Trickling through a recessed bed, a small stream makes its way south.  Moss grows on the basalt edges of the water's channel, the bright green a marked contrast against the blackish red rocks with their pocked surfaces.
